name: Run Rook!
description:
The residents of an apartment are tired of the rats scrambling around. They decide to pump toxic gas in between the walls to eradicate Rook's whole family. He needs to get to the top and save his family from death. Unfortunately for everyone, the owners have installed multiple hazards Rook will have to outsmart with his extraordinary movement.

This is a platformer that was done for a class lab at Polytechnique Montréal. I felt exploited as we were working on this that ended up accounting for only 15% of our grade. Putting it on itch.io gives it more meaning :)
